commands.name: az network front-door rules-engine rule create
commands.summary: Create a Rules Engine rule for a Front Door.
commands.syntax:
az network front-door rules-engine rule create --action-type {RequestHeader, ResponseHeader}
                                               --front-door-name
                                               --name
                                               --priority
                                               --resource-group
                                               --rules-engine-name
                                               [--header-action {Append, Delete, Overwrite}]
                                               [--header-name]
                                               [--header-value]
                                               [--match-processing-behavior {Continue, Stop}]
                                               [--match-values]
                                               [--match-variable {IsMobile, PostArgs, QueryString, RemoteAddr, RequestBody, RequestFilename, RequestFilenameExtension, RequestHeader, RequestMethod, RequestPath, RequestScheme, RequestUri}]
                                               [--negate-condition {false, true}]
                                               [--operator {Any, BeginsWith, Contains, EndsWith, Equal, GeoMatch, GreaterThan, GreaterThanOrEqual, IPMatch, LessThan, LessThanOrEqual}]
                                               [--selector]
                                               [--transforms {Lowercase, RemoveNulls, Trim, Uppercase, UrlDecode, UrlEncode}]

commands.name: az network front-door rules-engine rule delete
commands.syntax:
az network front-door rules-engine rule delete --front-door-name
                                               --name
                                               --resource-group
                                               --rules-engine-name

commands.name: az network front-door rules-engine rule list
commands.summary: List rules of a Rules Engine configuration.
commands.syntax:
az network front-door rules-engine rule list --front-door-name
                                             --name
                                             --resource-group

commands.name: az network front-door rules-engine rule show
commands.summary: Get the details of a Rules Engine rule.
commands.syntax:
az network front-door rules-engine rule show --front-door-name
                                             --name
                                             --resource-group
                                             --rules-engine-name

commands.name: az network front-door rules-engine rule update
commands.summary: Update Rules Engine configuration of a rule.
commands.syntax:
az network front-door rules-engine rule update --front-door-name
                                               --name
                                               --resource-group
                                               --rules-engine-name
                                               [--match-processing-behavior {Continue, Stop}]
                                               [--priority]
